page.title: 08RUSHBURY MANOR
page.content: Age of building{400 years.}Number of rooms 13, including 3 bathrooms. Heated by oil central heating,also coal or log fires or electric fires. Present owners have lived there for {17 years}and have carried out many alterations; no more planned for the future. Every room in the house has{old {wooden beams}.Panels in between are painted with rose white emulsion paint. The present owners are retired. Shopping is done in Church Stretton (baker's,grocer's, supermarket, newsagent's).Also Ludlow market and large shops in Shrewsbury.
